author: Brad Feld

text: Alan Arkin is one of my favorite actors. I just saw a note that he passed away yesterday. I expect I’ll look like him when I lose my hair since he looks like my dad. And every time I see Alan Arkin, I think of my dad.If you see me driving my Jeep around Boulder, I just gave you a hint about what my license plate (ARGOFY) means.Rest in peace, Edwin Hoover.
html:
Alan Arkin is one of my favorite actors. I just saw a note that he passed away yesterday.

I expect I’ll look like him when I lose my hair since he looks like my dad. And every time I see Alan Arkin, I think of my dad.

If you see me driving my Jeep around Boulder, I just gave you a hint about what my license plate (ARGOFY) means.

Rest in peace, Edwin Hoover.
